title: Courgette, sun-dried tomato and basil risotto
ingredients: ['1.7L vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 medium onion, chopped', '450g Arborio rice, uncooked', '1/2 medium courgette, thinly sliced with a vegetable peeler', '10 sun-dried tomatoes, softened and chopped', '1 teaspoon dried thyme, crushed', '6 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil leaves, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
